constituent: tribute, craft, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: A tribute has a kind of double-meaning in English: honor paid freely and money collected by coercion. Simply because a ruler bestows a noble name on a deed is hardly any consolation to the masses who must part with their hard-earned money. Little wonder that this ancient craft of getting money by calling it a tribute has given way to a name closer to how it feels to those who pay it: a tax.
koohiiStory1: This next song is a TRIBUTE to a little SHELLFISH friend of mine who was tragically crushed by an I-shaped table..
koohiiStory2: Tribute is the craft of raising money.
myStory: đóng góp. đồ nhân tạo từ vỏ sò để đóng góp
readingExamples: 貢献 (こうけん), 貢 (みつぐ)
